Title: Extends the effectiveness of certain provisions of chapter 329 of the laws of 2009, relating to removing special powers granted to the society for the prevention of cruelty to children
Summary: Relates to removing special powers granted to the society for the prevention of cruelty to children.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 329 of the laws of 2009, amending the family court act and the social services law relating to removing special powers granted to the society for the prevention of cruelty to children, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
